~ Lorillard Urban Center Initiative © nD ° So a ao o
summary: The Urban Center Initiative was created by Lorillard. The initiative aims to improve the quality of life in urban areas. It is based in New York City and has offices in Washington, D.C. and Los Angeles. For more information on the initiative, visit urbancenterinitiative.org.
